desc.en: Serika asks Sensei for tips on how to be a better miko. Sensei gives a passionate speeched based on mikos in anime and video games, which annoys Serika. However, she becomes bashful when she realizes they had a great time together.
desc.jp: Serika asks Sensei for tips on how to be a better miko. Sensei gives a passionate speeched based on mikos in anime and video games, which annoys Serika. However, she becomes bashful when she realizes they had a great time together.
desc.zh_cn: 为了成为完美的巫女工读生，{cf茜香}特地去找老师商量。虽然老师相当热情地为她说明一名巫女该具备什么样的条件，但是当{cf茜香}口中说的只是他从游戏和动漫中学来的知识后，她不仅感到有些恼怒。只是，当{cf茜香}意识到自己其实很喜欢和老师聊天时，她的脸颊便微微红了起来。

profile.en:
The smart treasurer of the Abydos Foreclosure Task Force.

A diligent girl who works several part-time jobs to help the Foreclosure Task Force, she is now working as a miko for the new year. Serika is giving it her patented best after being told she would get higher pay if she plays a convincing miko.
profile.jp:
アビドス対策委員会所属、巫女さん姿のしっかり者（？）の会計担当。

少しでも対策委員会の役に立つために、これまでも色々とアルバイトを掛け持ちして真面目に頑張ってきたセリカ。新年を迎えて彼女が選んだのは巫女さんのアルバイトだった。特別巫女さんが好きだったり造詣が深いわけではないものの、基本的に任せられればしっかりやり遂げようとする彼女の性格もあって、今回もまた全力で頑張っている様子（どうやら、より巫女っぽく振舞えれば時給が上がるという裏事情もある模様）。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
阿拜多斯高级中学所属，「对策委员会」换上巫女服的可靠（？）会计担当。

为了能多多少少帮上对策委员会的忙，一直以来干了各种兼职。
迎接新年到来，她选择了巫女的兼职。虽说并不是很喜欢巫女，在这方面的造诣也并不是很深，但因为有着只要接下职责基本上就会好好完成的性格，这次也仍在全力奋斗中（大概是因为表现得更像个巫女的话时薪会给的更多的内幕吧）。
profile.zh_cn_tw:
阿拜多斯对策委员会所属，身穿巫女服装的可靠（？）会计担当。

为了尽可能地帮上对策委员会的忙，一直从事着各式各样的兼职打工，认真且努力。迎接新年的她，选择了当巫女的兼差。即便不是特别喜欢巫女，对其也没有深厚的认识，但因为具备了「被交付了就会好好完成」的性格，所以这次仍是全力以赴（但背后也有「如果更像巫女的话，时薪会上升」的原因）。
profile.zh_cn_cn:
阿拜多斯对策委员会的细心会计。

为了尽可能帮上对策委员会的忙，一直努力做着各种兼职。准备迎接新年的她，这次接到了成为巫女的工作。听说如果能扮演“更完美的巫女”，就会拿到很高的工资，因此在全力以赴地研究巫女知识。

gacha.en: Well, if it's for Sensei, I'll lift up a prayer or two.
gacha.jp: 別にお祈りくらい、先生のためなら幾らでも……
gacha.zh_cn_jp: 只是祈祷而已，如果是为了老师的话无论多少次都……
gacha.zh_cn_tw: 祈祷而已，如果是为了老师的话不管几次都……
gacha.zh_cn_cn: 如果是为了老师的话，我愿意祈祷，不管几次都……

intro.en: This is my special miko outfit. What? You thought it was cosplay?! No, it's for my part-time job!
intro.jp:
これ？巫女さんの格好だよ。
えっ……コスプレ？ち、違うってば！
れっきとしたアルバイト！
intro.zh_cn_jp:
これ？巫女さんの格好だよ。
えっ……コスプレ？ち、違うってば！
れっきとしたアルバイト！
intro.zh_cn_tw:
这个？是巫女的打扮唷。
咦……Cosplay？才，才不是咧！
是货真价实的打工！

desc.en: Problem Solver meets with Sensei at the New Year's event and they head inside the venue to make their wishes. The Kaitengers attack just as they're all standing before the offering box.
desc.jp: Problem Solver meets with Sensei at the New Year's event and they head inside the venue to make their wishes. The Kaitengers attack just as they're all standing before the offering box.
desc.zh_cn: 在寻找新春活动会场时，便利屋的成员碰巧发现了老师，于是老师便从善如流地加入了她们的行列，和她们一起走进会场内许愿。就在大家并肩站在赛钱箱前许愿时，凯坦泽朝他们发动了突袭。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.zh_cn: 由于凯坦泽的攻击来得太过突然，等到便利屋成员们反应过来的时候，凯坦泽早已抢走赛钱箱并扬长而去。为了不让赛钱箱被抢走，老师和便利屋的成员们便开始追击凯坦泽。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Serika and Problem Solver realize something is amiss. They learn what's taking place is a race of greed where the last to claim the offering box also acquires its contents. Problem Solver resumes its pursuit, now more determined to secure the offering box than ever.
desc.jp: Serika and Problem Solver realize something is amiss. They learn what's taking place is a race of greed where the last to claim the offering box also acquires its contents. Problem Solver resumes its pursuit, now more determined to secure the offering box than ever.
desc.zh_cn: 察觉事情的走向不太对劲后，便利屋的成员和{cf茜香}才终于意识到她们加入了一场贪欲竞赛，而赢家可以将箱子里的所有东西据为己有。得知真相后，便利屋的成员们更加坚信不能让赛钱箱被{sn其他}人夺走，而激烈的追击战也因此再度展开。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

desc.en: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.jp: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.zh_cn: 麻衣是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作，在部分剧情中与诗音一起出现。

desc.en: Problem Solver now find themselves blocked by the Prefect Team. Iori unilaterally deems all parties in pursuit of the offering box delinquents and battles against Problem Solver for the unforgivable act of interfering with Prefect Team affairs.
desc.jp: Problem Solver now find themselves blocked by the Prefect Team. Iori unilaterally deems all parties in pursuit of the offering box delinquents and battles against Problem Solver for the unforgivable act of interfering with Prefect Team affairs.
desc.zh_cn: 在便利屋追击凯坦泽的途中，{cf伊织}和{cn风纪委员会}忽然现身挡住了她们的去路。{cf伊织}将所有企图霸占赛钱箱的人视为问题学生，并且表示自己绝不原谅有人胆敢妨碍{cn风纪委员会}运行公务，于是{cf伊织}和便利屋之间的战斗就此展开。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Sensei tells Iori this is all a misunderstanding and explains why they're trying to reclaim the offering box. Ako chastises Iori and says that the Kurokame Gang is behind this. She requests that Sensei and Problem Solver step back and let the Prefect Team handle the issue.
desc.jp: Sensei tells Iori this is all a misunderstanding and explains why they're trying to reclaim the offering box. Ako chastises Iori and says that the Kurokame Gang is behind this. She requests that Sensei and Problem Solver step back and let the Prefect Team handle the issue.
desc.zh_cn: 战斗告一段落后，老师赶紧跳出来向{cf伊织}解释误会，同时也告诉她便利屋想把赛钱箱找回来的真正理由。在训斥{cf伊织}的同时，{cf亚子}也将说出事件的幕后黑手是「黑龟组」，这一切都是为了洗钱的手段。

desc.en: Aru declares she won't give up on the offering box that contains Problem Solver's dreams, wishes, and cold, hard cash. Her words inspire Problem Solver and Serika to help Aru to the end, and they finally succeed in catching up with the Kaitengers at the Black Market.
desc.jp: Aru declares she won't give up on the offering box that contains Problem Solver's dreams, wishes, and cold, hard cash. Her words inspire Problem Solver and Serika to help Aru to the end, and they finally succeed in catching up with the Kaitengers at the Black Market.
desc.zh_cn: 面对{cn风纪委员会}的警告，{cf亚瑠}仍旧坚持要亲手找回赛钱箱，以及便利屋成员们的梦想和愿望。听完{cf亚瑠}的宣言，便利屋的成员和{cf茜香}也决定陪她一起努力。最终，便利屋一行人成功在黑市中将凯坦泽一网打尽。

desc.zh_cn: 成功击败凯坦泽后，便利屋和{cf茜香}本来以为这场风波终于能够落幕，没想到大吉殿的负责人龟岛五郎却在此时现身。在坦承这一切都是由自己在幕后操控的事实后，龟岛五郎突然朝便利屋一行人发动攻击。

desc.en: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?
desc.jp: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了新年。早早就前往以「实现愿望的地方」闻名的地点的{cn便利屋68}竟然碰上了赛钱箱小偷！究竟他们的愿望将会如何呢……！？

desc.en: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?

desc.en: Problem Solver and the Foreclosure Task Force begin their counterattack by spreading a rumor that the offering box is a fake.
desc.jp: Problem Solver and the Foreclosure Task Force begin their counterattack by spreading a rumor that the offering box is a fake.
desc.zh_cn: 随着假赛钱箱的消息传开，便利屋和{cn对策委员会}也正式向黑龟组发动反击。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Problem Solver succeeds in defeating the Kurokame Gang and reclaiming the offering box. As things settle down, the Foreclosure Task Force heads back while Problem Solver tries to return the offering box to its rightful place. However, the Kaitengers appear just as they realize it's empty.
desc.jp: Problem Solver succeeds in defeating the Kurokame Gang and reclaiming the offering box. As things settle down, the Foreclosure Task Force heads back while Problem Solver tries to return the offering box to its rightful place. However, the Kaitengers appear just as they realize it's empty.
desc.zh_cn: 最后，便利屋不但成功击败了黑龟组，就连赛钱箱也回到她们手上。骚动平息后，{cn对策委员会}先行一步返回{sn阿拜多斯}。便利屋则打算将赛钱箱放回原位，却意外发现赛钱箱内空无一物。这时，凯坦泽再次出现在她们的面前。

desc.en: It's another new year in Kivotos. What kind of wishes will Problem Solver 68 make amidst the bustling crowds of the New Year's event?

desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯迎来了新年。早早就前往以「实现愿望的地方」闻名的地点的{cn便利屋68}竟然碰上了赛钱箱小偷！究竟他们的愿望将会如何呢……！？

desc.en: The Kaitengers reveal that they have succeeded in using the stolen contents of the offering box to create the KAITEN FX MK.1. Aru leads the charge in a final battle against the Kaitengers, enraged that everyone's wishes and money have been abused.
desc.jp: The Kaitengers reveal that they have succeeded in using the stolen contents of the offering box to create the KAITEN FX MK.1. Aru leads the charge in a final battle against the Kaitengers, enraged that everyone's wishes and money have been abused.
desc.zh_cn: 凯坦泽告诉便利屋的成员们，赛钱箱内的香油钱通通都被他们拿去制作KAITEN FX Mk.1了。得知象征着众人心愿的香油钱被人拿去满足私欲后，愤怒的{cf亚瑠}便决定和凯坦泽展开最终决战。

desc.en: There are still young delinquents targeting the offering box even though the Kurokame Gang's evil deeds have been revealed and its members scattered, leaving no choice but to deal with them.
desc.jp: There are still young delinquents targeting the offering box even though the Kurokame Gang's evil deeds have been revealed and its members scattered, leaving no choice but to deal with them.
desc.zh_cn: 尽管黑龟组这个组织在阴谋败露后就瓦解了，但那些觊觎赛钱箱的问题学生们却依旧在各地制造骚动，迫使便利屋一行人不得不替他们收拾烂摊子。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

hobby.jp: パトロール、大声を出すこと

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.jp: Serika never receives her wages for her part-time job, and Problem Solver is left with nothing but an empty offering box. They all make new wishes in lighthearted relief before heading out to enjoy a meal with Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 虽然{cf茜香}最后没能要到打工费，而便利屋也只拿回空无一物的赛钱箱，但他们还是决定放下一切，并且在重新许下愿望后，以轻快的脚步拉着老师一起去吃饭。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
